bullets: 16,600 sq. ft. Infectious Diseases & Immunology Center providing HIV care to over 2,000 patients annually
Ryan White HIV Care Program serving >90% of PWH in Rhode Island with 20+ HIV faculty, APPs, and clinical pharmacists
Multidisciplinary team including social workers, case managers, nurses, nutritionists, and behavioral health specialists
Primary site for Providence/Boston Center for AIDS Research and Miriam Hospital Clinical Trials Unit
RISE TB Clinic offering adult and pediatric TB treatment, latent TB management, and directly observed therapy
Close collaboration with Rhode Island Department of Health for contact investigations and refugee/immigrant TB evaluations
